Key Match Events: Ireland produced a major shock in beating England on Wednesday.
Ireland did not get to take to the field against Afghanistan as the match was abandoned due to rain.
Pre-Game Insights: Andy Balbirnie insisted there is real belief Ireland can reach the T20 World Cup semi-finals.
Ireland now head to the warmer and sunnier climes of Brisbane to take on hosts and defending champions Australia at the Gabba on Monday.
Post-Match Reflections: Andy Balbirnie said the win over England was positive as they still managed to beat a team as good as England despite not playing their best cricket.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ireland, the second lowest-ranked side in T20s left in the competition, will likely need to beat both Trans-Tasman sides and hope for results elsewhere to go in their favour for a top-two finish in their group.
Others: Ireland were thwarted by the Melbourne rain on Friday.
